QuestData.Title: Talbuk Mastery
QuestData.Description: This darned scratch is getting the worst of me it would seem. So, are you up to filling...<cough>... in for me again?$B$BThis time you're going to bag yourself some thorngrazers. They're tougher and wilier than the stags, so keep your wits about you. Look for them... <cough>... sheltered under the trees in the middle of Nagrand to the west and south.$B$BGo on, get out there and...<cough>... show Hemet what you're made of. I'll be fine.
QuestData.LogDescription: Hunt down 12 Talbuk Thorngrazers and then return to Harold Lane at the Nesingwary Safari in Nagrand.
QuestData.CompletionText: I don't suppose...<cough>... you've taken care of those...<cough>... thorngrazers yet?
QuestData.RewardText: <cough>, <cough>... $n! You did it. There's only...<cough>... one thing left to...<cough>... do then.
